highlights.title: SEO and site architecture advice for SaaS/tool documentation
highlights.details: Hamza advises migrating a documentation page from a Netlify subdomain to the main domain and aligning slugs, meta tags, and headings with audience search behavior (keywords) identified via deep audience and competitor analysis.

highlights.title: Hera AI motion graphics tool and growth strategy
highlights.details: Hamza shares experience working with Hera AI, an AI tool for motion graphics. The brand is succeeding in its niche by prioritizing influencer marketing over SEO as their main growth channel.

channels.summary: Promotes an AI visibility playbook and event, with minor community guidance and off-topic humor.

highlights.title: Playbook for going from 0% to 20% AI visibility in 2 weeks
highlights.details: Michael announces a proven playbook, based on analysis of millions of prompt responses across 1000+ brands, to increase brand visibility in AI systems from 0% to 20% in two weeks using free tools, with Spotlight offered as an automation layer. A Google Form link is provided for an invitation.
